channel.title: Making it so you cant wear any capes?
channel.description: i made it so u cant wear any capes into castle wars... but some people have them in their inventory and put them on and change their capes... how do i make it so that you can't wear a cape while in castle wars, like you cant put one on.

item.description:

i made it so u cant wear any capes into castle wars… but some people have them in their inventory and put them on and change their capes… how do i make it so that you can’t wear a cape while in castle wars, like you cant put one on.
